channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M6
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M6

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 southbound between J31A and J31 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 southbound between junctions J31A and J30, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 southbound between J42 and J41 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 southbound between junctions J42 and J41, minor delays are possible due to barrier repairs closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 southbound between J27 and J26 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 southbound between junctions J27 and J26, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 10 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 am on 9 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 J29 southbound access | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M6 southbound entry slip at junction J29 will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 5 am, from 7 October 2011 to 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 J43 northbound access | Northbound | Sports Event
item.description: On the M6 northbound entry slip at junction J43 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to a sports event , from 12 pm on 2 October 2011 to 4 pm on 2 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 J43 southbound access | Southbound | Sports Event
item.description: On the M6 southbound entry slip at junction J43 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to a sports event , from 12 pm on 2 October 2011 to 4 pm on 2 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 J43 northbound exit | Northbound | Sports Event
item.description: On the M6 northbound exit slip at junction J43 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to a sports event , from 8 am on 2 October 2011 to 12 pm on 2 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 J43 southbound exit | Southbound | Sports Event
item.description: On the M6 southbound exit slip at junction J43 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to a sports event , from 8 am on 2 October 2011 to 12 pm on 2 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 southbound between J28 and J27 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 southbound between junctions J28 and J27, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to barrier repairs closing two lanes, between 10 pm and 5 am, from 3 October 2011 to 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 southbound between J23 and J22 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 southbound between junctions J23 and J21A, expect delays of up to 20 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 12:01 am on 3 October 2011 to 11:59 pm on 25 November 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 northbound between J21A and J22 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 northbound between junctions J21A and J23, expect delays of up to 20 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 12:01 am on 3 October 2011 to 11:59 pm on 25 November 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 J5 northbound exit | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M6 northbound exit slip at junction J5 will be closed due to carriageway resurfacing, between 10 pm and 5 am, from 4 October 2011 to 12 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 southbound between J1 and M1/A14 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 southbound between junction J1 and the M1, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 13 April 2013.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 northbound between J41 and J42 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 northbound between junctions J41 and J42, minor delays are possible due to barrier repairs closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 30 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M6 northbound between M1/A14 and J1 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M6 northbound between the M1 and junction J1, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 13 April 2013.
